subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán hit two more homers, his second and third of the series and 16th and 17th of the year, to nudge the Mets past the Arizona Diamondbacks. Carlos Delgado also hit two, and David Wright mashed one.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán hit two more homers, his second and third of the series and 16th and 17th of the year, to nudge the Mets past the Arizona Diamondbacks. Carlos Delgado also hit two, and David Wright mashed one.
